Aux:TextAnnotations.Aux:document_text: PURCHASE AGREEMENT Tiiis Agreement is made, as of January 1,2015 (the “Effective Date”), by and between Cengage Learning, Inc. 5 Maxwell Drive, Clifton Park, NY 12065 (“Cengage”), and Regents Online Campus Collaborative, 1415 Murfreesboro Pike, Nashville, TN 37217 (“Institution”). The patties hereto agree as follows: 1. The term of this Agreement shall commence as of the Effective Date and shall continue until June 30,2015. 2. During the term of this Agreement, Cengage shall provide, and Institution shall purchase and pay Cengage for, access to the MindTap online product, ISBN #9781285592527 (the “Material”) for each student enrolled in Institution’s SOC 1010 course (the “Course”), as of the add/drop date for the Course. 3. Within thirty (30) days following the drop/add date for the Course, Institution shall report to Cengage on the number of students who have enrolled in the Course as of such drop/add date. Upon receipt of such report, Cengage shall invoice Institution therefor. Within thirty (30) days following the date of such invoice, Institution shall pay Cengage, at an address to be advised by Cengage, sixty-five dollars ($65.00) for each such student. 4. Cengage shall provide and host, or an entity under contract with Cengage shall provide and host, the Material on Cengage’s or such entity’s website. Institution’s students for whom IACs have been purchased hereunder, shall have access to the Material on such website, via a link on Institution’s learning management system, for the term of this Agreement. 5. All hereunder shall be exclusive of taxes, if any. Except for taxes based on Cengage’s net income, Institution shall pay any federal, state, county, local or other governmental taxes, fees and duties now or hereinafter imposed on access to the Material. In Witness Whereof, the parties have executed this Agreement as of the date first above written. CENGAGE LEARNING, INC. By: ______________ Printed Name: SflMk Title: REGENTS ONLINE CAMPUS COLLABORATIVE ROCC.010115.010615
